# Drag and Drop Image Gallery

![Project Image](data:image/png;base64,)

A simple and intuitive image gallery where you can arrange images using drag and drop functionality. View the live demo [here](https://drag-drop-image-gallery1.vercel.app/).

## Table of Contents

- [Features](#features)
- [Getting Started](#getting-started)
- [Usage](#usage)
- [Contributing](#contributing)
- [License](#license)

## Features

- Drag and drop images to rearrange them.
- Upload images from your device.
- Supports popular image formats (JPEG, PNG, GIF).
- Authentication for managing your gallery.
- Responsive design for both desktop and mobile devices.

## Getting Started

To use this image gallery locally or deploy your own version, follow these steps:

1. Clone this repository:

   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/your-username/drag-drop-image-gallery.git

2. Navigate to the project directory:

  ```bash
  cd drag-drop-image-gallery

3. Install dependencies:

  ```bash
  npm install

4. Start the development server:

   ```bash
  npm start

5. Open your web browser and visit http://localhost:3000 to see the gallery in action.

##Usage
-Authentication: If you want to access advanced features like image upload and management, sign in with your account.

-Rearrange Images: Simply drag and drop images to rearrange their order within the gallery.

-Upload Images: Click the "Add Image" button or use drag-and-drop functionality to add new images to your gallery.

-Responsive Design: The gallery is designed to work seamlessly on both desktop and mobile devices.

##Contributing
Contributions are welcome! Feel free to open issues or pull requests to suggest improvements, report bugs, or contribute new features. Make sure to follow our code of conduct.
